alert.note: Alert for Buffalo (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 10:22PM CDT until May 05 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR EASTERN BUFFALO COUNTY... At 1021 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kearney, moving northeast at 20 mph. At 1014 PM CDT, trained spotters reported quarter size hail 1 mile west-southwest of Kearney. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kearney, Gibbon and Poole. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 270 and 283. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
